dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome to JobE HR Management Platform
dashboard.welcomeDescription: Your organization dashboard will show key metrics and insights here.
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome to JobE - HR Management Platform

noOrg.title: Create your first organization
noOrg.description: To get started, create an organization. You can add positions and invite teammates afterwards.

onboarding.title: Welcome to Your Organization
onboarding.description: Let's get started by setting up your organizational structure. Follow these steps to import or create your departments and positions.

import.title: Import Your Data
import.description: Upload an Excel file with your departments and positions for quick setup. We'll guide you through the process.

departments.title: Review Departments
departments.description: View and manage your organizational departments. You can edit, add, or remove departments as needed.

positions.title: Manage Positions
positions.description: Review all positions in your organization and start evaluating them to build your compensation structure.

errors.generic: Failed to create organization. Please try again.

emptyState.title: No Positions Yet
emptyState.description: Start by importing positions from Excel or create them manually.

emptyState.title: No Departments Yet
emptyState.description: Start by importing departments from Excel or create them manually.

orgStructure.title: Organization Structure
orgStructure.description: Manage your organization's departments and positions

import.title: Import from Excel
import.description: Bulk upload departments and positions using a template

departments.title: View Departments
departments.description: Browse and manage your organizational departments

emptyState.title: Get Started with Your Organization Structure
emptyState.description: Import your departments and positions to begin evaluating jobs and building your org chart.

settings.title: Settings

settings.pleaseLogIn: Please log in to access settings.

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed here. Use the Email section below.

email.changeDescription: Change your email address. A verification email will be sent to the new address.

password.description: Ensure your account is using a strong password
password.changeDescription: Change your password to keep your account secure
password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.allFieldsRequired: Please fill in all password fields

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
deleteAccount.warningDescription: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.

settings.comingSoon: Display name updates will be available soon

rateLimit.title: Account Temporarily Locked

register.error: Failed to create account. Please try again.
register.emailVerificationNotice: You'll need to verify your email address before you can log in.

emailStep.title: Enter your email

emailStep.success: Reset link sent! Check your email.

passwordStep.title: Set new password

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email

pending.checkSpam: Can't find the email? Check your spam folder or request a new verification email.

success.title: Email verified!
success.message: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.

error.title: Verification failed

logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?

import.title: Import Data
import.subtitle: Upload Excel files to bulk import departments and positions
import.description: Upload your organizational data quickly and easily

hero.descriptionDepartments: Upload your department structure using our Excel template. Make sure your file follows the exact format shown below.
hero.descriptionPositions: Upload your position data using our Excel template. Make sure your file follows the exact format shown below.

step1.title: Template & Upload
step1.description: Download our template and upload your prepared Excel file
step1.label: Upload

step2.title: Data Preview & Validation
step2.description: Review your data and confirm to proceed with import
step2.label: Preview

step3.title: Import Complete
step3.description: Your data has been successfully imported
step3.label: Complete

step1.title: Template & Upload
step1.description: Download our template and upload your prepared Excel file

instructions.title: How to get started
instructions.step2: Fill in your department and position data
instructions.step3: Upload the completed file using the button below

step1.templateInfo: The template includes example data and helpful comments to guide you through the process.
step1.uploadDescription: Drag and drop your Excel file here or click to browse

step2.title: Data Preview & Validation
step2.description: Review your data and fix any validation errors before importing

validation.warningsDescription: {count} warning(s) found - you can proceed but review these items
validation.successDescription: No validation errors found. Your data is ready to import.

preview.departmentsDescription: Review the departments that will be created or updated
preview.positionsDescription: Review the positions that will be created or updated
preview.noDepartments: No departments found in the uploaded file
preview.noPositions: No positions found in the uploaded file

errors.title: Validation Errors
errors.description: Fix these errors in your Excel file and re-upload

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.description: These issues won't prevent import but should be reviewed

step3.title: Import Complete!
step3.description: Final review before importing your data
step3.noDataError: No data available for import. Please go back and upload a file.

summary.title: Import Summary
summary.description: Review what will be imported into your organization

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.note1: New records will be created with the data provided
notes.note2: Existing records (matching codes) will be updated with new values

confirm.title: Ready to Import
confirm.description: Once you confirm, the import process will begin. This may take a few moments depending on the amount of data.
confirm.question: Are you sure you want to proceed?

step4.title: Import Complete
step4.description: Your data has been successfully imported

importing.title: Importing Your Data...
importing.description: Please wait while we process your data. This may take a few moments.

success.title: Import Successful!
success.description: Your departments and positions have been successfully imported into your organization.

tips.title: Next Steps
tips.tip1: Review your imported departments and positions to ensure everything looks correct
tips.tip2: You can edit or delete any records directly from the departments and positions pages
tips.tip3: Start evaluating positions to build your compensation structure

instructions.title: How to structure your Excel file

departments.title: Departments Sheet
departments.description: Create organizational units with hierarchical relationships

positions.title: Positions Sheet
positions.description: Define job positions with department associations and reporting lines

tips.title: Tips
tips.codes: Use clear, unique codes (e.g., IT, IT-DEV, MGR-001)
tips.hierarchy: Reference parent codes to create hierarchies
tips.blanks: Empty rows will be skipped automatically
tips.upsert: Existing records will be updated, new ones will be created

validation.title: Validation Errors
validation.fixErrors: Please fix the following errors and try again:

confirmation.title: Confirm Import
confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to import this data?
confirmation.summary: This will create {creates} and update {updates} records.

success.title: Import Successful!
success.description: Your data has been imported successfully
success.whatsNext: What would you like to do next?

errors.uploadFailed: File upload failed. Please try again.
errors.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload an Excel file (.xlsx or .xls).
errors.parseError: Error parsing Excel file. Please check the file format.
errors.validationError: Validation failed. Please fix the errors and try again.
errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to import data.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

format.title: Excel Format Guide
format.description: Your Excel file must match this exact format
format.tip1: Do not modify column headers - they must match exactly
format.tip2: Include exactly 3 rows of data (no more, no less)
format.tip4: Use the correct data types for each column

departments.tip: Use unique codes for each department. Parent codes must reference existing departments to create hierarchy.

positions.tip: All positions must have a valid department code. Use unique position codes to avoid conflicts.

upload.title: Upload Your File
upload.description: Drag and drop your Excel file here, or click to browse

errors.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload an Excel file (.xlsx or .xls)
errors.tooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB
errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload file. Please try again.
errors.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.

errorDisplay.title: Import Issues
errorDisplay.cannotProceed: ⚠️ You must fix all errors before proceeding with the import.
